content: *ski band bag and scarf in classic shades of grey complement any outfit ski band one size scarf 8 20 5cm x 46 117cm scarf approx 9 x 10 23 x 25 5 cm shown in patons classic wool 4mm us g or 6 crochet hook patons yarns * skill level intermediate ski band 00225 dark grey mix 1 ball size 4 mm u s g or 6 crochet hook for ski band band is worked flat then seamed flap is then added and finished with a tassel on the tip written directions are provided in pdf download september 2008
